name: Turrani
summary: Turrani is a city on the island Leng in the eastern Jade Sea. It is located on the southern shore of the forested island, near the mouth of a river and north of the Manticore Isles.[1] Unlike Leng Yi and Leng Ma in the north, which were founded by men of Yi Ti, Turrani was founded by the original inhabitants of the island. It is a wealthy city rich in spices and gems.[2]
